content.detailedDescription:
In this night of observations i was able to spot this blue\white\green orb at west of my position, she was flying n to s in a angle of 75 to 80 degrees very slow, pulsing all the time. i start to do light signals, and she stops, turns to east and come above my house positioning at south of me in an angle of almost 90 degrees, then starts to flying around me and maybe because of that plane the last time i see her was at south, this night the moon was also at south of me in quarter crescent.

one hour later i was like always with my head turned up, searching the skies and certainly a cloud of fireflies start to shower all over my house, i was recording this when i spot the blue orb, running at an imaginable speed, direction the sea nw, never see such speed in a object man made in my entire life, it was at the level of a meteorite. previously, in this year at 8 of july and last year same month, i have seen this clouds of fireflies, but because there light are very tiny i was not able to record them, only with binoculars, they came inside a oxidized copper green colour like, mist or cloud. first one i observed above the forest, the second one above the military nato deposit near me, this ones coming from west, from the sea, and finally all over me, and on this very not normal valley where i live. i believe this images are rare and i hope my work serves something directed to science and development of our universal human conscience, why here all this sightings? that is the investigation i am doing, 80% of this light goes ne, i hope in my time of life i found the answer.
my apologies for the bad cam and recording i am just one with 2 hands and if you could get the images better i appreciated.(not easy to upload from here 2and try)
thank you
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blue orb pulsing and blinking interacting with me returns one hour later and deploy fireflies and went away at more than 7mtrs by sec.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the office and after having lunch me and a coworker decided to go up to the 2 story building's roof to try to take some pictures or video of a lighting storm that was taking place. while trying to catch a good video of the lightnings with my cellphone's camera i spotted the bright orb hovering very high and very far away in the sky although still under the clouds lines. we thought about what it might be for a while and made a couple of videos but after about 30-40 minutes it started to move father away and as we had to go back to work anyways, that was it.
content.summary: Spotted when on the roof trying to take pictures of a lighting storm

content.detailedDescription:
When i and my daughter were playing at the brushy creek in round rock, texas, my 6 years old daughter saw a ufo flying by. she said it moved slow and the color was metallic grey. it had windows and 5 flashing green lights on its side, and the bottom had some yellow solid lights. she said it moved slowly to north and out of sight.
she did not talk about it for some reason( kids do sometimes?), and the next morning she confessed it. she seems like serious. when she saw it, i was away from her and did not notice at all.
content.summary: My 6 yrs daughter saw a ufo, which is cone shape, 5 green light and yellow bottom

content.detailedDescription: I reported this incident to a website "just answer", and was given your site to report my experience.  i was walking our dog outside through the garage when i noticed through the garage glass door two(2) very distinct blue orbs moving about, in and around, our vehicles in the garage. it was very dark inside the garage and the orbs were very bright blue and very visible.  for just a moment, i was startled by the sight, but when i finally opened the door, the two(2) blue orbs vanished.  i stood there for a minute trying to gather my thoughts, and then with questions bouncing around in my brain, took our dog out back to do her business.  when i got out back the two blue orbs were in our neighbors backyard and they stayed there for a long time.  actually were still there when i went back inside the house.  i didn't tell anyone for a while because i knew my family would have a field day making an ass out of me.  when i finally told my wife and kids the mockery and kidding never stopped.  i kept it to myself after that until i reported it to "just answers" to get some sort of answer and closure.  i'm a 78 year old male with no agenda and i know what i saw!  i will continue to keep this to myself, but i would be happy to take a lie detector test.  take care
content.summary: These were two blue orbs spotted moving about my garage, then neighbor's backyard

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

my brother and i were in his garage (either during thanksgiving or christmas). we were smoking a cigarette and i noticed a flash of a purple light which lit the sky. i saw it again but this time it was blue. it changed colors several times. i told my brother to look and he missed it but finally saw the last flash of light. about five minutes later we both observed a humming or vibrating noise. i asked him to check his cell phone because it sounded like a cell phone vibrating when it's on silent. the lights lasted approximately 2-3 minutes but the buzzing lasted around 45 minutes. i got scared so we eventually went inside. it was the weirded experience ever and both of us witnessed it.
content.summary: Bright lights followed by humming or vibrating noise

content.detailedDescription:
Hi,

my brother and i were in his garage (either during thanksgiving or christmas). we were smoking a cigarette and i noticed a flash of a purple light which lit the sky. i saw it again but this time it was blue. it changed colors several times. i told my brother to look and he missed it but finally saw the last flash of light. about five minutes later we both observed a humming or vibrating noise. i asked him to check his cell phone because it sounded like a cell phone vibrating when it's on silent. the lights lasted approximately 2-3 minutes but the buzzing lasted around 45 minutes. i got scared so we eventually went inside. it was the weirded experience ever and both of us witnessed it.
content.summary: Bright lights followed by humming or vibrating noise

content.detailedDescription: Okay here goes they have a base up in the sky which i had been watching this cloud that was lit up and it had been going on for about a year that i noticed this cloud i used to look at it all the time trying to work out where the light was coming form.Anyway one night early saturday morning it was about 130 am and it was raining i was out side having a smoke and i was looking at this cloud like i had been for a long time and while i was looking at this cloud i notice these star like lights appear and there were many of these lights and these lights were flashing there lights at me i could not believe that they were watching me and they started to come out of the clouds and they were like putting on a show they were flying over the trees and it went on for about an hour.Then these lights went to one corner of the sky under the clouds and they were doing someting i don't know what but then out of that cloud that was lit up this big ball of light came out of this colud and it went over to the little star like lights and something happened and they went away and then this ball of light was going back into that cloud but then it truned around and came straight down to me i had my video camera. but i thought i was going to die i was so scared so scared i hit the ground this thing came in so fast i didn't have to to hit the deck it was over me i could not beleive what was happening i still have not gotten over it? anyway i got up slowly and i looked at this thing i was inside this thing it was like mist or ghost like and it was really big i mean big it was about 300ft long? and i looked at this thing and my spine was in pian so scared and i said hello to it i was looking up at this thing and when i said hello it just flashed it lights that was its eyes so strange unbelieveable.And then it took off back into that cloud that is still here.But its not the cloud its what is invisible that is there anyway i know all about now this thing or alien that i met it came back 2 days later and then i knew what it was that i was seening all my life i can see them when they are invisible they look like dark shadows when they are invisible its along story?? and i have thousands of videos of them they become visible to me we are like friends now all so hard to believe they fly over i wave to them and they flash their lights at me its a very long long story thanks i will stop here.And i do have a photo of the alien i met and they have shown me what their invisible alien base looks like its like some sort of highway anyway i will stop here thank you.Ps i do have lots of videos but my files are to big abd i do have video of their base lots
content.summary: I was out side it was raining when i noticed this really big light coming striaght for me i thought i was going to die ? and they still keep coming around ?

content.detailedDescription:
Lived on an acreage io miles east of airdrie - driving from airdrie with son and daughter (8-12) years old.

looked up to south just close to fence, and noticed a black shiny airplane shaped object with no wings no engines, no tail, no windows, and no lights-  we got out of the car, and looked up at it probably 500 feet above us, just to the south of the fence.  it was in the afternoon 
, it was a clear day, no clouds,  there was  no noise, we had a clear view of the entire object and we stood by the fence, and watched it for 10 to 15 minutes while it was motionless, just above us to the south of the road, just by the fence.
.
then it headed off to the south east, going very slowly, still only about 500 feet up, and then it went off to the south east side  of the field, from where we had watched it, before it slowly got out of site.  when it left, it was still silent, and there were no lights of any kind.

we then went home, and told my wife what we had seen, and both of my children  verified what i had told her.

i have never seen an all black airplane, with no windows, no lights, and   especially with no wings, and no engines, that could hang above us for at least ten minutes, and then head off to the south part of  the field slowly at only 500 feet off the ground!!!

i did tell all my friends what we had seen but did not know of any place at that time, to verify what we had seen. this happened twenty years ago at  the end of the summer.

michael c d. - retired lawyer
content.summary: Shiny black object looked like 747 with no tails, no lights no noise

content.detailedDescription:
1. parish priest was driving me back to boarding school in hamilton that night after having dinner at my parents house in camperdown,we were driving back and it was that sought of night where you did not need to put on your headlights,but we did as it was a full moon and not a cloud in the sky.
2.It was actually father flanagan who noticed it first.He said can you see that? i said no. then i saw it also, and he asked me what i thought it was? to which i replied it was a ufo.Now father was an amateur astronomer who used to take students for science activities at night looking through his 2 telescopes at the heavens.
3.We stopped the car and got out to observe the object,during our observations we went through everything we thought that the object could be.The object was less than 100 feet away from us.We said is it a blimp, no there were none in australia at that time.Only the goodyear blimp in the usa.Was it a reflection off something? no. was is an astronomical anomaly of some thing? no.Was it that we were both hallucinating and imagining the object in front of us?No. are we both sane and normal? yes.Father said to me not to tell anyone about this as it was totally removed from his catholic religion and he did not want anyone to find out about our sighting. the object we saw at close range was massive 100' to 120' in diameter and between 600'and 700' long, there was no sound at all, there were no flashing lights,you could not see any join marks or rivet marks ,but was seamless not a dint in the exterior metalwork ,the ends of the vessel were perfectly rounded,the were no extrusions ,exhausts,fins engine openings no visible hatches,doors anything.The object was about 50' off the ground and hovering just to the back of a house that was there.We did not speak to the occupants if there was any as we were concerned about being abducted or whatever.We climbed back into the car and drove the car from one end of the object to the other this is how we arrived at the approximate size of the object. we got out and continued to observe the object until father flanagan said i think it was time that he got me back to boarding school.
4. the object was perfect in every detail there is no way that we could manufacture an object that big and cold fly,float not move and be completely silent.So there was no movement whatsoever,up down,sideways forward or backwards.They had obviously mastered antigravity and speed of light propulsion. 
5. i think both of us felt privileged to have witnessed this sighting it changed my beliefs in life in the universe.To this day i have not spoken to father flanagan who is still parish priest in hamilton;victoria and i would like to know what are his thoughts about our sighting today ,he is a lot older than me.I am not sure what you people think , but i now believe that there are an incredible number of civilisations out there and that we should be looking at classifying the different types of ufos seen where ,when and the time,the 50s were saucers, the 60s various 70s cylinders. 80s boomerangs, 90s wings.20s v shapes and various. that could be 7 or 8 different civilisation that have travelled enormous distances to check us out.
6.We left the object exactly where we found it.I have always wondered if there was anyone living in the house at that time and weather they noticed anything. if you were asleep in the house it would not have woken you as it made no sound.
content.summary: The ufo was a platinum type material you could see it clearly had no windows,lights,rivets

content.detailedDescription:
Flashing ball of light, lit up one time and disappeared.

same event was witnessed by myself the couple nights before, but the object lit up about 3 times and then disappeared without a trace.
content.summary: Flashing ball of light, lit up one time and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i stopped at the enroute in king city on our way home from pearson international airport. the caliper on the driver's side brake had seized and needed checking. while my husband threw a hammer to it, before it got too cool,  i took my camera  from the car and snapped 3 photos of the sun's rays between and beneath the storm clouds brewing. the first 2 i took were at 4:30pm. the third was at 4:33pm. i looked at the pictures after we got back on the road. i wanted to see how they'd turned out. the first two photos were just the clouds and sun rays. but the third was different.That's when i saw the orb in the attached digital photo. i knew it wasn't the moon, because it was 4:33  when i took it,and, we were in the second night of the full moon, so it would not be anywhere near the sun. i would like to know what it is though. also, my flash was turned off while i took the photos. and i saw nothing at all in the sky while taking them.
content.summary: Took 3 pictures while in parking lot, the 3rd one had an orb, or, circle shape in it. didn't see it when i took the picture.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my grandparents' back deck, near the pool talking to my grandmother and sister who were in the pool. my grandmother noticed the blinking light, pointing it out because it was too bright, white, and periodical to be a lightening bug. it was hovering about 20 feet off the ground. it blinked every second for a little less than a second. at this point it wasn't in the sky, as it was between us and the garage. the only other nearby lights came from inside the house, and they didn't reach where the light was coming from, so we couldn't see the source of light, and it didn't continue moving so that it reached the light. the three of us watched it and talked about it for about five minutes until i went inside the house to grab my phone and describe it to the others who were inside. my mom came out to see it, but it was gone by the time we got back to the deck. my grandmother said it had floated back around the corner, out of sight. i don't know if it's important but she also said she and my sister had shouted at it, something along the lines of 'don't mess with us' and 'we don't want to go with you,' i don't remember specifically. we described it to my mom, who prompted the idea that it may have been a drone. i considered it, but am personally skeptical due to the fact that it was relatively quiet that night and we didn't hear noise coming from the light that would likely have come from a drone. my mom and i went to the front of the house to see if the light had moved that far, but we did not see it. there was a moment where a light flashed in front of my eyes, but that was likely due to reflection from inside or off of my mom's earring onto the lens of my glasses. we went back to the back deck, and my mom went back inside, but i stayed in case it came back. a few minutes later we spotted it again, this time in the tops of the trees in front of the house, the same white blinking light. we watched it slowly move through and around the tree tops, circling the house, it went from the trees in the front yard to the back yard and back to the front. we knew it wasn't a plane because it was much too close to the ground, only had one light brighter than any lights that you could see on planes, and did a loop in the sky, not the straight route across the sky that planes typically take. we lost sight of it after it seemed to go back to the trees in the front yard. during and after the sighting my actions and the actions of the other witnesses were normal, it didn't do anything to us but freak us out a little, it's not every day you see a literal unidentified flying object.
content.summary: A small white blinking light that hovered and slowly flew from near the ground to the trees

content.detailedDescription: I was on a boat tour in nyc. a few people at the back of the boat by me noticed the object. it was just hovering over part of the city. when i looked at my phone to get a video of it. the object made a quick 180 degree turn and it was gone. being on the water we had a good view of the sky line over the ocean. and we couldn't see it anywhere. it never made a sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Noticed the object on boat tour.

content.detailedDescription: On a summer night around dusk back in the early seventies my family and i were on our way to evening church service. as soon as we exited the back door we looked up and saw a saucer shaped craft hovering directly above our house. it was so close i could have thrown a stone and hit it. it was a metallic silver color with no weld or rivet marks. it made no noise or emitted any smoke. it was approx 30 - 40 ft in diameter.It had a glowing ring of light around the mid section. my parents, brother and i looked at it for several mins. my older sisters were terrified and ran in to the house. the craft slowly began to rise and we gathered all of our family to follow it. it moved slowly northward towards mt. doug. we followed it for 5-8 mins. it went behind the mountain and disappeared. that was the last we saw it. to this day neither of my sisters can recall the incident, yet my parents, brother and i can remember it vividly. the entire encounter was approx 15-20 mins. in my mind there was no doubt what it was.Over the years i have told the story to a few friends but have met mostly with disbelief and laughter. it has not affected my life in any way, good or bad. i recently saw on one of your programs an incident that was very similar with the craft hovering directly above a house. so , i thought i would share this with your group.
content.summary: My entire family viewed the craft hovering approx 50"directly above our house.It was a silver disc, no noise, approx 30'- 40' with a ring of lights around it. we watched it for some time then it started to move . we followed it in our car until it disapp

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along as i suddenly noises this incredibly bright light overhead. so bright. cannot get over how bright and i own some of the world's brightest flashlamps and do a lot of flash photography. one minteam it was there, almost above me. then it suddenly shot off horizontal, and suddenly the light just disappeared. weird thing i ever saw.
content.summary: The brightest light imaginable. saw it almost overhead stationary. then it shot off. so bright! then just nothing!!!

content.detailedDescription: Im speak french. sorry
content.summary: [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard at approximately 10:30 p.M. (mountain time zone) in early july 2016 looking at the night sky as i do every night. appearing in western sky was a white orb traveling in a straight line from west to east. it was at approximately 5,000 feet traveling between 100-200 mph and did not make any noise. the object was no further than 1-2 miles from my location. there were no other aircraft in the immediate area. the white orb was not pulsating and was no larger than a small civilian aircraft. there were no collision avoidance lights (red or green) emanating from the object.

this occurred twice within a one week period at about the same time each night. the object disappeared from sight both times beyond a small mountain as it made a straight path eastbound. 

it was very similar to mufon case number 66546 (june 17, 2015.) i found the mufon case as i did an internet search of "white orbs over saint george, utah." although my observation did not entail neither a helicopter in the area nor a "morphing" of size and shape of the white orb. we are within a few hundred miles of nellis air force base, hill air force base, and dugway proving grounds. so, probably military related.
content.summary: Very similar to mufon case number 66546 (june 17, 2015).

content.detailedDescription: Contact jenny @ 615-292-5397 [hq] for our verbal.  the giant waited for the lights to change and walked down the street. how i saw the giant's outline i do not know but it was cloaked.               sincerely mike pierce   519-351-1852.
content.summary: I saw a giant at least 20' feet tall standing at an intersection waiting for the lights to change!!!

content.detailedDescription: At 9:30 i stepped outside my house to smoke a cigarette... i always look at the stars while outside at night... at one point i looked at a particular group of stars directly above me and there was a flash... not a bright flash more of a dull flash that appeared and then stayed...As i tried to focus my eyes on wat i was looking at it began to move... at first i thought it was a plane but it appeared bigger than the stars....I might add that the reason i focused on it was because the brightness of the object was not constant nor did it blink... it was almost as if it was reflecting the light from the city...Anyway it moved from east to west and it changed its brightness from dull to bareley noticable except that my eyes had already locked on to it...I watched it appear to slow down speed up and head east...No blinking lights as the planes that fly overhead do at night...Just a maintained dull light on an obvious orb....That changed intensity as it flew over and away...It appeared to change direction before it got far enuff away to where i lost sight of it but not certain...It truly excited me and i told my wife immediately...
content.summary: I witnessed a bright flash by a group of stars that preceded to move

content.detailedDescription:
Had just returned home from going for a drive due to the heat. had seen it before we left in the same spot its been in for the last month. this time however it was no longer in its usual triangle formation but instead was almost lined up in a straight line. at first i thought it was just a weird star formation since there are a few around my area. but when i first noticed it around the beginning of august, it would begin to move after 9pm. and then around midnight it would be out of sight. i can usually see it from my couch and it normally appears to be hovering over the tree that's about 100 feet away from my house.

i'm just confused and intrigued by it because i've never seen it until this summer and the way it slowly moves east at a certain time of the night is odd as well. but seeing it now forming in a line is weird. like i said, when i first saw it there were three star like points in the formation of a triangle and it's been like that until tonight, august 24, 2016. so yea, i just want to know what it is and why it's hanging around my house.

the first photo attached is unedited and the second photo is the object circled to point it out better.
content.summary: Seemed to be moving into straight line

content.detailedDescription: I was standing near lummi shore when i noticed a object headed toward me from the south. it slowly passed overhead and contunied northward till i lost sighted of it. i could clearly see the shape as a triangle atleast the size of a basketball. no noise  no exhaust. green lights on both sides, at least 4 on the sides. i was amazed and confused. told some other people they didn't believe me and no one else was around to see it.
content.summary: Black large triangle passing over my head

content.detailedDescription:
I first noticed a very bright shimmery cloud as i was looking out my door. i even asked my partner to come see it since it looked so odd. i decided to go outside to take a picture of it but it was so bright i just held the phone up to the sky and pushed the button without being able to see the screen. i went back into the house to look at the picture since it was darker inside and i noticed the white/green orb in picture. i went back outside and took another shot to see if it would be in the picture again and it was. i could not see any orb or object in the cloud or the sky with my naked eye. i went back in to show the pictures to my partner, and he thought it could be the moon. i went back out to see and there was no moon in sight. i took a few more shots from slightly different angles trying to get the sun out of my eye to see if i could actually look or focus on what i was photographing so there are some differences in the angles of the pictures . 

after reviewing the pictures, i noticed that in the ones where the orb is not visible, there is an object in the sky, with a silver/gray color. in two of the photos, the shape is less easy to distinguish. one of the photos, it clearly has a triangular shape. the object can be seen in the upper left corner of the pictures where there is no orb.
 
the orb looks perfectly round in some of the photos but in others there is some sort of shadows or change in shape or something is obscuring part of the shape. the orb is not in the same place in the photos. if you notice, there is the same tall tree in most of the pictures for perspective. there is also an airplane in the middle of the cloud formation in the second picture. 

i wasn't paying attention to sounds or feelings other that being excited by seeing the cloud formation and then the orb. i never saw anything with my naked eye so i don't know how the orb or object moved or if it made any sound. 

the cloud lost shape and dissipated and the last photo there is no sign of the object or orb.
content.summary: Object appeared in photos taken of a very bright cloud formation in bright late afternoon sunlight.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was walking my dog in the neighborhood. 
2. i was watching the sky because there were many airplanes making there decent into hartsfield.
3. i thought it looked kinda like a spherical hot air ballon with the basket on fire maybe???
4. i watched the orb with a burning bottom for a little over a minute. the intensity of the flame varied a little bit. the object was close enough to where i could clearly make out the shape. only the bottom was illuminated. try to imagine a dull black sphere with fire on the bottom.
5. i was happy to see it. the existance of aliens had always been obvious to me. i had ample time to view it. i took out my phone but quickly gave up because the image just looked like a blur. i didn't want to miss the experience fumbling with my phone. i was exicited after seeing it and call a few friends to tell them.
6. it drifted past the tree line (horizon).
content.summary: A flat black sphere drifting south. approx 1000 feet altitude. dont know how else to describe it - the bottom was on fire.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside the house on the third (top) floor looking to the east and i saw in my periferal vision a large object approaching, it was already at an angle of 45 degrees when i spotted it and it took less than 5 seconds to fly over the house . a large cross of white lights (like a constellation) flew over very fast without making any sound. it was roughly 8 to 10 times the width of the moon and appeared to be far away because the lights were very dim like a constellation or a sattelite but it moved way to fast to be a sattelite. it came in from the north and i watched it as it flew over my house, i ran through the house to have another look at it which took maybe 4 seconds but it was gone.
content.summary: A large cross of white lights flew over very fast without making a sound. it was roughly 8 times the width of the moon. it came in from the north and i watched it as it flew over my house, i ran through the house to have a look at it and it's gone

content.detailedDescription: I stayed the night at pinon flats in great sand dunes, co last week. during my stay my friend and i were taking photos of the night sky at our campsite. i was going through the photos this evening when i came across a series of photos taken at a slow shutter speed where four lights in a straight line move across the sky.
content.summary: Lights flying through the night sky above great sand dunes, co captured in photographs

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were looking for comets around 10 pm on the 13th. this object passed directly over us in a straight steady motion. i snapped a picture when it was in the 1:00 position above us.  i tried to video it using my phone but it looks so small in the recording. it really was much larger in real life. it was strange because it had no sound or no flashing lights it was visible until the end of the horizon.  i have a sky viewer app on my phone but i couldn't find anything with the same trajectory as this? i would love to know what you think.
content.summary: Bright object traveling in a. w-e direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the top of my city, a little park-like compound in the center on a hill and observed the stars. i was about to leave, packed the blanket in my backpack and looked randomly in the sky.
the object that i saw was penny-sized in the sky, a curved line of light, brownish-orange colour tone, i don´t know what i saw, looked repeated times precisely at it. it moved from east to west in a almost straight line in a consistent speed, faster than any kind of plane but slower than any meteorid i ever saw. i watched it in awe but felt nothing special. also no sound was heard. i lost sight of the object because of some trees and couldn´t change my position fast enough.
content.summary: Curved line of light

content.detailedDescription: Was out on my back deck where i always see planes flying by. (there's a flight path to the nearest airport over my house) my wife noticed a solid orange/red light that was moving west to east slowly, it proceeded to move at a very fast rate, than abruptly slow down and head north dropping down towards the horizon in a strange motion (down while turning and back up and down again) it then disappeared and appeared on the eastern horizon to where i could no longer see it. than a second object appeared to the west and moved in the same fashion. it was silent, roughly 1km away when i first noticed it. i see a lot of airplanes, helicopters and satellites over my house and this is like something i have never seen and could not explain. the only similar object i have seen to it is a chinese lantern from a distance. but they normally move quite linear and are normally white/orange and do not last as long and go as far as these objects. this flashed red and orange and had a very erratic flight path.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Slow east to west trajectory, with sudden burst of speed than headed north slowly

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving down to work at casino on imhoff road right before slater rd. i saw 3 bright lights in the fog not 20 feet off of the ground. they seem to hover there below the tree line. they were maybe 100 yards from  the road where i was driving. i thought maybe it was a tractor but heard nothing but a light hum when i drove by slowly. they didn't  move just sat there being very bright. then after i drove by they disappeared. i looked  back and they were gone. it was very very foggy only in that spot of road. i didn't have time to take a picture or stop because it was foggy and  was afraid some one would hit me from behind. i couldn't any other cars on the road during this. maybe there is a good reason for this but i don't know  what it is. spoke to a  friend at work and she said to let tim ward know and i told him and he said  to put it on this sight and he would check it out as he hooked up with mufon. so here it is !!
content.summary: 3 bright lights in a  triangle formation
